plot outline: Nana was a part of Goa's freedom struggle comes to Goa for Jubliee ceremony and sees that people want to sell their land for builders for huge some of money and disturb village ,Nana feels the need for yet another Liberation movement in Goa. Will Nana's Satyagraha triumph?
title: Gadya Aapla Gaon Bara
plot: Nana was a part of Goa's freedom struggle comes to Goa for Jubliee ceremony and sees that people want to sell their land for builders for huge some of money and disturb village ,Nana feels the need for yet another Liberation movement in Goa. Will Nana's Satyagraha triumph?::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
